name: Fullsteam Payment Gateway
author: Fullsteam

sections.description:
Fullsteam Hosted Payment Gateway Form of WooCommerce

makes your website ready to use Fullsteam Method to accept credit/debit cards on your ecommerce store in safe way.

Fullsteam is most widely used payment gateway to process payments online and accepts Visa, MasterCard, Discover and other variants of cards.

Features

Few features of this plugin:

  1. No SSL Certificate required
  2. Easy to install and configure
  3. Safe way to process credit/debit cards on WooCommerce using Fullsteam
  4. This plugin use hosted solution provided by Fullsteam and payment is processed on secured servers of Fullsteam

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
Easy steps to install the plugin:

  1. Requires PHP Version almost 7.0 and greater.
  2. Upload full-steam-gateway folder/directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to WooCommerce => Settings
  5. On the “Settings” page, select “Payment Gateways” tab.
  6. Under “Payment Gateways” you will find all the available gateways, select “Fullsteam Gateway Method” option
  7. On this page you will find options to configure the plugin for use with WooCommerce
  8. Enter the integration details (API Key, Api Secret, Api Merchant etc).
sections.faq:
Is SSL Certificate required to use this plugin?

  • SSL Certificate is not required. The user will enter card information on Fullsteam’s Hosted Form. Fullsteam take care of all card handling and processing security.

Is PCI DSS Certification required to use this plugin?

  • PCI DSS Certification is not required.

What version of WordPress and Woocommerce does this work with?

  • Tested with WordPress 5.8.1 through to 5.0 , WooCommerce version 5.6.0 through to 5.3

short_description: This Payment Gateway of WooCommerce extends the functionality of WooCommerce to accept payments from credit/debit cards using Fullsteam Gateway.
